remarks: Lemma for join properties.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
statement:
joinval2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
joinval2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
joinval2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
joinval2.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
joinval2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
joinval2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
joinlem.e $e |- ( ph -> <. X , Y >. e. dom .\/ ) $.
joinlem $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X .<_ ( X .\/ Y ) /\ Y .<_ ( X .\/ Y ) ) /\ A. z e. B ( ( X .<_ z /\ Y .<_ z ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) .<_ z ) ) ) $.
$d .\/ z $.
$d B z $.
$d K z $.
$d X z $.
$d Y z $.
